attributes.action: provide financial assistance from the treasury to licensed premises to compensate them for the losses in trade from the forthcoming smoking ban imposed on them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many leased and tenented public houses will be forced into bankruptcy following the smoking ban as they are landlocked and cannot make provision for a covered outside smoking area.
many of these people have commited their life savings into developing their business and will loose everything. i would like the government to provide financial assistance to all licensed premises, be it in the form of a duty decrease or grant for smoking solutions to try to prevent these losses. either way if this is not possilble, to pass legislation that prevents this type of bankruptcy from affecting credit ratings therefore enableing these people to stat again in another chosen business.
